name: #MarbleTop
description:
Disclaimer game is still currently under development.

Controls

WASD/Joystick 1: Marble

Arrows/Joystick 2: Top(Board/Platform) *tentative

Mouse/Joystick 3: Shooter *tentative

Objective

Rack up points by avoiding the obstacles and staying on the platform while increasing your multiplier by collecting the gems!

#MarbleTop made by @hyperscope with contributions by the @VoyageArts collective.
